title: DTL to Julian Date Converter
name: LGF_DTLToJulianDate
description:
## Short description ##

This function converts the date and time of data type DTL to the Julian date and as well the 
modified Julian Date to data type LReal (Double).
The timestamp is calculated based on UTC. This means that the time zone is not considered.
Only times after 01/01/1990 are permitted.

input.name: timeDTL
input.description: Date and time as DTL to convert to Julian Date

output.name: error
output.description: An error occurred during the execution of the FB

output.name: status
output.description: Status of the FB, Error identification
